data.title: Road Trippin‚Äô
data.meta_description: Listen to Road Trippin‚Äô on Spotify. Hosted by Allie Clifton, Channing Frye, & Richard Jefferson, Road Trippin' is the premier podcast for entertaining and insightful NBA stories told directly by your favorite players. Episodes often feature a guest NBA player or a sports and entertainment personality.
data.text:
Our guest on Road Trippin' this week is Chet Holmgren of the Oklahoma City Thunder. Chet was an incredible guest and opened up about so much. Topics include: The Rookie of the Year race against Victor Wembanyama, his "WHAT A PRO WANTS" commercial, sweeping the New Orleans Pelicans, losing to the Dallas Mavericks, what he learned from the playoffs, the additions of Alex Caruso and Isaiah Hartenstein, the brilliance of Sam Presti, learning to ignore the media and much more. Subscribe to Road Trippin' with Allie Clifton, Richard Jefferson and Channing Frye podcast YouTube channel for more NBA player interviews, analysis and highlights. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

The Road Trippin' crew (Richard Jefferson, Channing Frye, Allie Clifton) is back with another live podcast, joined by ESPN's Kendrick Perkins, to discuss all things related to NBA free agency news this week, including: Klay Thompson to the Dallas Mavericks, Paul George to the Philadelphia 76ers, and more!See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

In this episode from this week's YouTube live, the Road Trippin' crew (Richard Jefferson, Channing Frye, and Allie Clifton) is back for a mailbag episode answering your offseason questions! They discuss JJ Redick becoming head coach of the Los Angeles Lakers, if they think the Boston Celtics can repeat next season, what the Denver Nuggets need to do this offseason to return to the Finals, Team USA in this summer's Olympics, and much more.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown and the Boston Celtics are your 2024 NBA Champions. What a season it was. Richard Jefferson, Channing Frye, Kendrick Perkins, Devin Harris and Allie Clifton are here to break down how the Celtics took out Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving and the Dallas Mavericks in their live reaction from after Game 5.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

The Celtics beat the Mavs in Game 2! The Road Trippin' crew and ESPN analyst Kendrick Perkins are here to react to Game 2 of the NBA Finals between Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving and the Dallas Mavericks, and Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown, Jrue Holiday, Kristaps Porzingis and the Boston Celtics. Perk also explains what he thinks about LeBron James unfollowing him.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

It‚Äôs NBA Finals time! On this week‚Äôs episode we preview the upcoming series between the Dallas Mavericks (Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving) and the Boston Celtics (Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown), discuss which players could be the x-factors, and which star will ultimately have the best series. We also breakdown RJ‚Äôs debate with Rasheed Wallace on who would win in a seven game series: 2017 Golden State Warriors or the 2004 Detroit Pistons. This was a fun one. Let‚Äôs go!See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

After the tragic passing of Bill Walton, we at 'Road Trippin'' wanted to show our love and appreciation for him by revisiting our 2017 interview with him. He was truly one of a kind.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

Game 1 of the Eastern Conference Finals just wrapped up and WHAT A GAME! We had Tyrese Haliburton, Myles Turner and the Indiana Pacers almost upset Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown and The Boston Celtics until Brown hit the game tying 3-pointers to send it into overtime. Richard Jefferson, Channing Frye and Allie Clifton are joined by none other than ESPN analyst, Kendrick Perkins to break it all down. The we preview the Western Conference Finals match-up between Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving and The Dallas Mavericks vs. Anthony Edwards, Karl-Anthony Towns, Rudy Gobert and the Minnesota Timberwolves. Who will come out on top between the Mavs and the Wolves? Who knows but WE CAN'T WAIT!Subscribe to the Road Trippin' podcast YouTube channel today for more NBA Playoffs reactions, analysis, highlights player interviews and more.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

On the latest edition of 'Road Trippin', Allie Clifton, Richard Jefferson, and Channing Frye discuss the latest with every playoff series, which playoff crowd is the best, why the MVP voting was "lazy", why it seems like every coach gets recycled to a new team, and much more.‚ñ∫ YouTube! üíª https://www.youtube.com/roadtrippin ‚ñ∫ iTunes üîä https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/road-trippin/id1195897108?mt=2 ‚ñ∫ Spotify üîä https://open.spotify.com/show/4Q4qqC6UxoTB09ePc14AbB?si=4a514bea430b4b8b üç∑ FOLLOW ROAD TRIPPIN' üç∑ ‚ñ∫ Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/roadtrippin/ ‚ñ∫ Twitter | https://twitter.com/roadtrippinpodSee Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

JJ Redick joins Allie Clifton, Richard Jefferson, and Channing Frye of 'Road Trippin' to discuss the Minnesota Timberwolves stunning the Denver Nuggets, the rise of Anthony Edwards, how Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray can break through against the Wolves defense, and Rudy Gobert skipping Game 2 for the birth of his child. Then they discuss JJ's coaching rumors, Jalen Brunson leading the Knicks over the Pacers, and give hot takes about Celtics-Cavaliers & Thunder-Mavericks.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

After their tenth straight win against the Lakers, and 10 victories in a row, are the Nuggets psyching out the Lakers? On this edition of Road Trippin, Richard Channing and Allie discuss the adjustments the Nuggets have made against the Lakers, and how it's giving Los Angeles fits. Also, the crew looks at the Timberwolves who have pounced on the Suns, and the impact Rudy Gobert has on a team in the playoffs. Finally, the crew looks at the crazy usage rate of Luka Doncic, and how impactful he has been for the Mavericks in their series against the Clippers. ‚ñ∫ YouTube! üíª https://www.youtube.com/roadtrippin ‚ñ∫ iTunes üîä https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/road-trippin/id1195897108?mt=2 ‚ñ∫ Spotify üîä https://open.spotify.com/show/4Q4qqC6UxoTB09ePc14AbB?si=4a514bea430b4b8b üç∑ FOLLOW ROAD TRIPPIN' üç∑ ‚ñ∫ Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/roadtrippin/ ‚ñ∫ Twitter | https://twitter.com/roadtrippinpod Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

After his latest incident, Draymond Green is back in the spotlight for reasons other than his play. How much are his antics contributing to the struggling nature of the Golden State Warriors? On this episode of Road Trippin', Richard and Channing discuss how much of a distraction Draymond is being while the Warriors fight for a playoff spot. Also, the crew looks at the Houston Rockets and discuss how coach Ime Udoka has managed to change this team so quickly. Also, the guys lament the Arizona Wildcats, and discuss the state of the program after their most recent loss during March Madness. ‚ñ∫ YouTube! üíª https://www.youtube.com/roadtrippin ‚ñ∫ iTunes üîä https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/road-trippin/id1195897108?mt=2 ‚ñ∫ Spotify üîä https://open.spotify.com/show/4Q4qqC6UxoTB09ePc14AbB?si=4a514bea430b4b8b üç∑ FOLLOW ROAD TRIPPIN' üç∑ ‚ñ∫ Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/roadtrippin/ ‚ñ∫ Twitter | https://twitter.com/roadtrippinpod Learn more about your ad choices.
